translation.about_us_chapter_content_1: I think we are... (Read PLZ) Cryptocurrency was supposed to be the great equalizer, the digital phoenix rising from the ashes of centralization. Since 2011, I was fascinated by Bitcoin, this brilliant, decentralized idea born from the dream of freedom. But look where we are nowcontrolled once again. 99% of the wealth in the hands of the few. The same cycle, just with a different face.
translation.about_us_chapter_content_2: We‚Äôre not here to fight the system we‚Äôre here to resist it by building our own. ESCAPE is the best performing on-chain ecosystem, rewarding true believers with massive returns. Through transparency, fair resource distribution, and collective control, we‚Äôre creating a decentralized future where power belongs to the community. Join us and take control.
translation.about_us_chapter_content_3: The crypto elite hoards profits we‚Äôre changing that. ESCAPE is five high-return blockchain projects (Exchange, Sniper Wealth, Communism, AI, Protocol, Ecosystem) Together, these projects will generate millions of $$ in annual revenue, directly distributed to holders and stakers. No middlemen. No gatekeepers. Just pure profit-sharing for the HOLDERS. Join us and take control.
translation.about_us_chapter_content_4: TO BE HONEST  This is more than a MEME it‚Äôs a movement. The ones who join now will be the ones who reap the highest rewards. Example : Crypto exchanges make billions of $$ every year but who really profits? The elites. Now, imagine owning a share in an exchange project, earning a monthly INCOME just for believing. TO BEHONEST : With or without YOU, ESCAPE will rise. The 5 ESCAPE Projects will be built, no matter what. We‚Äôre not asking for permissionwe‚Äôre giving you a once-in-a-lifetime chance to join the  elite community. You either watch from the sidelines or claim your place at the top. The choice is yours. Believe. Escape. Profit. üöÄ
translation.FaqDropDownData_1: PepeScape is a meme-based crypto project inspired by Mr. Robot, blending crypto rebellion, FOMO, and cult marketing. It‚Äôs more than a token it's a movement against centralization, embracing the darknet spirit and freedom through decentralization.
translation.FaqDropDownData_2: PepeScape will be available for purchase during its presale phase. You‚Äôll need: A crypto wallet (like MetaMask or Trust Wallet).  ETH or BNB (depending on the chain). The official PepeScape presale link (stay cautious of scams!).
translation.FaqDropDownData_3: Join the PepeScape community for real-time updates:
translation.FaqDropDownData_q_4: üëÄ Is there a team behind PepeScape?
translation.FaqDropDownData_4: PepeScape is powered by anons who believe in true decentralization. The team operates from the shadows, just like the cyber-revolutionaries who inspired this movement.
translation.FaqDropDownData_5: The official launch date will be revealed soon. Stay tuned in our Telegram and Twitter/X channels to be the first to know!

translation.howToBuy_content_1: The system was never meant for you to win but we‚Äôre changing the game. Every time the Escape Decentralized Business generates $100,000 in profit, $PROFIT holders receive USDT airdrops straight to their wallets! üî• The more you hold, the more you earn. üî•
translation.howToBuy_content_2: Designed for those who dare to escape the system, $PEPC delivers real rewards to those who hold and stake. Built on Ethereum with high APY staking in a secure smart contract, $PEPC stakers will receive continuous rewards throughout the Community Sale and for the next two years.üî• The longer you stake, the more you earn. üî•
translation.howToBuy_content_3: We‚Äôre not here to fight the system we‚Äôre here to resist it by creating our own decentralized ecosystem. Through transparency, equitable resource allocation, and collective decision-making, we are shaping a new path where control is in the hands of the community, not the elites.üî• A system built by us, for us. üî•
translation.howToBuy_content_2_1: Does the PEPC Army already have wallets? ü§î If not, consider using MetaMask. On mobile, we recommend MetaMask or Trust Wallet just download the app to get started!
translation.howToBuy_content_2_2: Load ETH, BNB or USDT to your wallet to swap for $PEPC tokens. Send a little extra ETH or BNB to pay for gas fees. If that‚Äôs a hassle, just use a bank card.
translation.howToBuy_content_2_3: To purchase $PEPC, connect your wallet to the site. Select payment method and amount to buy. Confirm the transaction. Stake $PEPC if you want that sweet APY!
